Look at these terrible color combinations I'll use on this site!

What follows here are three sets of three colors each (9 total colors) that looks terrible together. They clash. They create dissonance. They include browns, yellows, lime, indigo, purple, rose and dark blue. This looks like the 1980s vomited on the page.

I'm building this site in the open and never have much time, so stuff is constantly broken and incomplete.
